member.name: IPipeLong.Pull
member.summary: Retrieves data of the long integer type from the pipe source.
member.param: A pointer to the memory buffer that receives the data. The buffer must be able to hold at least the number of long integers specified in cRequest.
The number of long integers requested.
The actual number of long integers returned.
member.returns: This method returns S_OK to indicate that the data was retrieved successfully.

member.name: IPipeLong.Push
member.summary: Sends data of the long integer type to the pipe source.
member.param: A pointer to the memory buffer that holds the data to be sent.
The number of long integers in the buffer.
member.returns: This method returns S_OK to indicate that the data was sent successfully.

member.name: IPipeLong
member.summary: Transfers data of the long integer type (which is 32 bits wide).
